personal.objective: Work in a game studio as programmer.
personal.bio: I was born in 1992, Porto Alegre, Brazil. I was 7 year old when I started to use computer. Playing games was my main activity years later, making me want to work with it.

courses.description: Development of Digital Games - Programming and Game Designer

professional.name: Autonomous Development
professional.description: Paid Android/IOS game for a kid toy. My classmate brought the project to create a program that will enhance the experience of the toy. This program allows to take photos and import them to virtual cube. For each faces there will be a game using the animal sprite as the player. If the face associated with the animal has a photo taken, it will be used as the animal sprite texture in game.

professional.name: Autonomous Development
professional.description: Paid web PHP system to store plant photos for academic purposes. It is like a gallery to expose the information collected in the other system with photos. Using MVC, Bootstrap, Jquery and MySql.

professional.name: DBServer
professional.description: I've got this job after a good presentation in Students to Business. I've participated in three different projects, all in C# and SQL Server. Two were maintenance. The last was from beginning. The system was about material test control with laboratories and budget managements. The client was a government organ and they participate in meetings with my team after each Scrum sprint. In November I decided to stop working in web systems and start studing to work with programming games.

professional.name: Autonomous Development
professional.description: Paid web PHP system to store plant data collected by the university. Using MVC, Jquery and MySq.

professional.name: Unilasalle
professional.description: I started as a probationer and finished as a middle programmer. I was learning the theoretical part of computation at university and the practice in this job. My job was to create programs for the internal administrative system, student portal and professor portal. The language and database was PHP and Oracle g10. Sometimes I converted old programs from the old system in VB Desktop to the new in PHP. In the last year on the job, I started going to meetings with department leaders to define future programs.

games.name: Starlit On Wheels: Super Kart
games.description: Welcome to the ride of your life with the heroes from Starlit Adventures: Bo and Kikki! Help Bo and Kikki on a thrilling chase to recover the stars that the villain Nuru has stolen to power his magical motor. During this exciting journey you'll confront breathtaking tracks and obstacles, and be challenged by enemies and creatures from the Starlit universe in championships full of fun and adventure. Along the way, you'll drive remarkable cars with special powers. While you enjoy this journey to save your friends, you'll upgrade your cars, collect rewards, assemble a trophy room and create your own tracks that other players can race and evaluate!

games.name: Starlit On Wheels: Super Kart
games.description: Become the greatest Archer in Starlit universe! Play with your favorite characters and enjoy the story-line from the universe introduced in the award-winning game Starlit Adventures!

games.name: The Magic Tower
games.description: Wizards with the ability to conjure elements to cast powers will fight against waves of monsters inside the tower. Sometimes, they brawl with each other to decide who is the best caster.

games.name: Sprawl Celerity
games.description: Sprawl Celerity is a futuristic 3D Battle-Racing video game with fast cars, powerful weapons and tracks in different scenarios, designed for PC with support for local and networked play.

games.name: Jump 'n Bump
games.description: Jump 'n Bump is a deathmatch competition among rabbits. The player must step over other rabbit to kill it. The rabbit whose kill the most wins!

games.name: Galaga
games.description: Galaga is a classic arcade game. I've recreated it using Monogame for 2D Programming class work.

games.name: Drawing Cube
games.description: This game is an auxiliary toy game. The toy allows kids to draw on all cubes faces where each face has an animal borders drawn. With this game, the kids can import theirs draws by taking photos. For every face (will be) an unique game using a sprite cut from the photo put in the correspondent face. It allows them to play games with theirs draw.

games.name: Project Boosters
games.description: It isn't a game yet. It is just a concept right now. I have some ideas but I'm busy with other projects. Probably it will be an adventure with fire powers with puzzles and bosses to defeat. Would you like it?

otherGames.name: Bomberman 3D
otherGames.description: Bomberman 3D is a game based on the classic Bomberman games. The difference it is a 3D game in first person. It features campaign mode, battle local and battle online.

otherGames.name: Strategy Warriors
otherGames.description: Strategy Warriors is a pseudo turn-based game in progress. It’s genre is artillery with a mechanics which requires each team sets movements to all it’s pieces.
